message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
Take it or leave it, I'm the dominant one!
A slight adjustment, but I still think this is a fair split
You're getting desperate, take the crumbs!
Last chance, Bob, let's make a deal
You're getting close to nothing, don't say I didn't warn you!
This is my final offer, take it or leave it
You're really running out of options, don't you think?
This is my final, symbolic offer. I'm done negotiating.
You're really grasping at straws now, Alice.
